means: 斯法克斯（突尼斯东部港市）

means.word_mean: 1. the second largest city in Tunisia; located in eastern Tunisia near a phosphate region

auth_sentence.content: In Sfax, many people are also guardedly upbeat.
auth_sentence.res_content: In Sfax, many people are also guardedly upbeat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In Sfax, many people are also guardedly upbeat.

auth_sentence.content: But from the industrial city of Sfax, the economy is getting a boost from an unexpected source - Libya.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But from the industrial city of Sfax, the economy is getting a boost from an unexpected source - Libya.

auth_sentence.content: The Tunisian club are preparing to defend a 4-2 first leg lead at Tayeb Mhiri Stadium in the Mediterranean town of Sfax.
